Edge TTS Reader: High-Quality Text-to-Speech

Bring your browsing experience to life with Edge TTS Reader, the ultimate text-to-speech (TTS) extension powered by Microsoft Edge’s advanced Read Aloud API. With natural-sounding voices and customizable options, this extension makes it easy to listen to selected text or entire web pages—anytime, anywhere.

Why Choose Edge TTS Reader?

Gone are the days of staring at long articles or struggling to absorb information visually. Edge TTS Reader transforms your browser into a virtual assistant, delivering high-quality, natural-sounding audio. Whether you’re multitasking, improving productivity, or simply prefer listening over reading, Edge TTS Reader has you covered.

Key Features

🎤 High-Quality Text-to-Speech

Access high-quality voices powered by Microsoft’s Read Aloud API at no cost. Enjoy clear, lifelike narration that’s easy to understand and customizable for different contexts.

📖 Read Selected Text

Highlight any text on a webpage, right-click, and choose “Read Aloud with Edge TTS.” The extension will instantly read the selected content aloud.

🌐 Read Entire Web Pages

Right-click anywhere on a webpage and choose “Read Entire Page Aloud with Edge TTS” to listen to the full page content seamlessly.

🎛️ Customizable Settings

	•	Adjust reading speed to your preference (from slow to fast).
	•	Choose from a wide variety of voices to match your style, tone, or mood.

🌓 Dark Mode Support

Edge TTS Reader respects your system preferences with light, dark, and system theme options for a comfortable user experience.

🖱️ Easy-to-Use Popup Interface

Control playback, select voices, and adjust settings effortlessly with the intuitive popup menu.

📋 Context Menu Integration

Perform text-to-speech actions directly from the right-click menu, streamlining your workflow.

🛠️ Lightweight and Efficient

Built with performance in mind, Edge TTS Reader is fast, responsive, and works seamlessly without slowing down your browser.

🔒 Privacy-Focused

Your data stays secure. Edge TTS Reader processes text locally or securely through Microsoft’s trusted APIs. We never store or share your data.

How It Works

	1.	Highlight Text or Use Context Menu: Select the text you want to hear, or right-click and choose “Read Entire Page Aloud.”
	2.	Launch the Popup: Use the popup menu to customize settings like voice, speed, and theme.
	3.	Listen and Enjoy: Sit back and let Edge TTS Reader turn text into clear, natural-sounding speech.

Perfect For:

	•	Professionals: Listen to articles, emails, or reports while multitasking.
	•	Students: Use TTS for study materials, research, or eBooks.
	•	Accessibility: Support for users with visual impairments or reading difficulties.
	•	Language Enthusiasts: Explore different voices and pronunciations.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What languages and voices are supported?
The extension supports a wide range of voices and languages provided by Microsoft’s Read Aloud API. Choose voices that best suit your needs and preferences.

Q: Does this work offline?
Edge TTS Reader requires an internet connection to process text via Microsoft’s API, but it’s lightweight and efficient, minimizing bandwidth usage.

Q: Is my data secure?
Absolutely. Your text is processed securely and never stored or shared. Privacy is our priority.

Get Started Today

Transform the way you consume content online with Edge TTS Reader. Whether you’re browsing for fun or studying for exams, this extension brings the power of natural-sounding text-to-speech right to your browser.

Click “Add to Chrome” and start listening today!
